Bad angle, sound is distorted and echos, Video is really bad at any bright parts its really blurry hard to see. thanks for effort. sit farther back next time lol
@restrictive=no one needs your a**hole comments. If you think its so easy, why not record a movie yourself and upload it?

@range_os - If the only thing you can do is whine and complain, then why not just wait for the DVD release, or upload a better copy yourself. These uploaders are greatly appreciated for their early releases. 

And, the people who risk jail time and huge fines by recording these movies are also appreciated. Stop spoiling everything with your ungrateful noobish behavior.
